name: FIRST
headline: The best way for any business to offer delivery.
description:
We are building the Marketplace for On Demand Delivery. 

We provide an all-in-one Delivery OS that brings all orders into one place, dispatches these orders to the best available delivery service, and provides the tools to manage the post-purchase experience.

The founding team started Habitat Logistics, where we powered delivery for restaurants, and delivered over 1M orders all on our own software.

founders.name: Andrew Nakkache, Founder
founders.description: Hey, I'm Andrew! I originally got into YC for a business called Habitat Logistics, where we delivered orders from Grubhub, Uber, and DoorDash.  In having to build our own software, we realized that…everyone is having to build their own software. Before starting Habitat and now FIRST, I graduated from Temple University in Philadelphia and graduated with a degree in economics. I'm particularly fascinated by behavioral economics. I also enjoy playing tennis and skiing.

**Trusted By**
#####  The all-in-one Delivery Operating System designed to take your business to new heights
####  Pizza Shops 
It's not Digornio, it's Delivery. You’re stuck between a rock and a hard place. In-house drivers are tough, and letting 3P drivers take over, hurts your brand. 
**There’s a better, cheaper, faster wayto offer delivery. Why just have a slice, when you can have the whole pie.**
[ Learn More ](https://firstdelivery.com/<http:/vhs.pfg.mybluehost.me/pie>)
####  Ordering Services 
Delivery is table-stakes for any ordering service, but the support & engineering costs of offering delivery is one tough pill to swallow. **FIRST provides delivery infrastructure, orchestration, and support so you can focus on your core business.**
[ Learn More ](https://firstdelivery.com/<https:/vhs.pfg.mybluehost.me/ordering-services/>)
####  Delivery Services 
We get it, running a fleet is hard - we scaled our fleet to 50K deliveries per month before pivoting to FIRST.**FIRST offers driver scheduling, fleet management, 30+ turnkey integrations, and much much more.**
[ Learn More ](https://firstdelivery.com/<https:/vhs.pfg.mybluehost.me/delivery-services/>)
[![](http://vhs.pfg.mybluehost.me/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/extra-smalllll.png)](https://firstdelivery.com/<firstdelivery.com>)
1111B S Governors Ave #6545Dover, DE 19904 
info@firstdelivery.com 
[ Pizza Shops ](https://firstdelivery.com/<https:/firstdelivery.com/pie/>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: FIRST**

* **Name:** FIRST
* **Founded:** 2014
* **Location:** Philadelphia, PA
* **Website:** [firstdelivery.com](https://firstdelivery.com/)
* **Team Size:** 12 Employees
* **Y Combinator Batch:** W19

### Mission and Vision

At its core, FIRST is on a mission to redefine how businesses approach delivery. They believe they provide the best solution for any business looking to enhance its delivery service. Initially envisioned as a marketplace for on-demand delivery, FIRST has evolved into an all-in-one Delivery Operating System—essentially a centralized platform that aggregates orders, dispatches them to optimal delivery services, and manages the customer experience post-purchase.

### The Founders

The founding team previously ran Habitat Logistics, which notably powered delivery for restaurants and managed over 1 million orders using their proprietary software. This experience in the delivery ecosystem has heavily influenced FIRST's offerings.

### What They Offer

FIRST's platform caters particularly to the needs of various players in the delivery landscape:

- **For Pizza Shops:** They tackle the dilemma of maintaining brand integrity with in-house drivers versus relying on third-party services.
- **For Ordering Services:** They handle the heavy lifting of delivery logistics so these businesses can focus on their core operations.
- **For Delivery Services:** Drawing from their previous experience of scaling a fleet to 50,000 deliveries per month, they provide comprehensive fleet management and driver scheduling.

### Key Metrics

- **Over 4,000 Active Restaurants**
- **$70M+ in Food Delivered**
- **2M+ Deliveries Processed**

### Tags and Categories

FIRST is categorized under the tags ['saas', 'delivery', 'logistics'], indicating its core focus on software solutions in the logistics and delivery sectors.

### Conclusion

By offering a streamlined and efficient delivery Operating System, FIRST positions itself as a modern solution for many businesses grappling with the challenges of logistics and customer fulfillment in today's fast-paced environment. Their focus on improving the delivery experience ultimately helps businesses increase their operational capacity and customer satisfaction.

If you're interested in transforming your delivery operations or just want to learn more, check out their website or request a demo for a hands-on look at what FIRST can do for you.
